Seven new flavors added to the REVOSA Energy Vending Machine!


22 Oct 2015

So today I spent most of my time creating seven more flavors of my infamous energy drink line-up and then I stuffed them into my vending machine and released an update.

Now, along with the initial atomic grape, you can have 5 loko, blueberry blast, citrus burst, fizzy cola, orange splash, spilled blood (a vampire variety cherry blood mix) and diet fizzy cola!

Each can is texture with a dark and dirty looking sort of theme and includes ambient occlusion for ultimate realism. Yes, they look like they all rolled through a gutter before they made it into my machine, and ultimately, your hands, but hey, they taste great! Just be wary of that 5 loko, I hear it‚Äôs banned in a few systems.

You can grab the vending machine here or come see it (and taste the flavors) inworld here!

[NEW] REVOSA Energy Vending Machine


18 Oct 2015

Way back like almost a year ago, when I was still under the company name ‚ÄúFull Carbon‚Äù I had created an energy drink named ‚ÄúMoxie Energy‚Äù which became a drift race team name and signature drink of the aforementioned business.

Upon the split with my previous business partner and the rights loss to Full Carbon, I also lost the work I‚Äôd done on my first energy drink. So as a response to that seven months ago when I started this business, I made an energy drink called ‚ÄúREVosa Energy‚Äù which was actually part of how I even named my new business, and since have included a free copy of the drink with nearly every single product listed in my store.

Now, after all this time, I‚Äôve decided to update the drink with brand new mesh and high resolution

textures. Not only that, but when attached to your avatar it plays a snap and fizz sound, at which your avatar will sip the drink for two minutes before it automatically detaches! To go alone with this, I made a vending machine by hand (that‚Äôs only one land impact!) and loaded up with an infinite amount of my signature drink.

The vending machine itself plays a low humming ambient sound for realism and when clicked it plays a scifi-esque sound that can only be described as a beaming of sorts, as if it‚Äôs beaming the drink into your pocket! And now, for 79 linden, you can have this vending machine all to yourself (marketplace link)! Put it in your club, your bar, your hangout, your home, wherever! Your day hasn‚Äôt started until you‚Äôve had your caffeine, and now you can have it right at your fingertips.

I will also be including the new and improved drink with every product I make from this point forward, as usual.

And if you‚Äôre reading this, don‚Äôt forget to stop by the store today and slap the MM board! Your ride is right here. Have a wonderful Sunday.
